title: Redy - Driving In India (2015) mp3 320kbps [deepstatus]
description:
Redy - Driving In India 2015

After many releases for different publishing houses around the world,
Redy gets the offer for India tour in June 2013. on which he gets inspired
to work on his new second album, Driving in india. Having a great
cooperation with Belgian publishing house Dimensional Records.
Redy starts the album that consists of 6 points, shaped with sharp
melodies and unique rhythms accompanied with fast leads that fulfill
melody bass lines. The basis of the album is synthetic but a lot of
forest and industrial notes can be heard. Fobi-Do U Wish remix is
featured on the album which Redy finished in his own style.
Enjoy the album and see you on the stage.? ;)

Biography

Redy, aka Ivan Mirovic, was born on 31 July 1986 in Bela Crkva,
a small town in ex Yugoslavia now Serbia. Growing up with his mother,
who tried to direct him towards hippy culture while she was one of its
followers, Redy become interested in this kind of music, actually just
in the rhythm because he was too small to understand English.

But soon he started looking for a little harder sound so he began
to take guitar lessons in order to make music which would suit him more.

In 1999 he went to one Ã¢â‚¬Å“Psy TranceÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ party, where he was the youngest,
only 13 years, and there he heard something that attracted his attention.

In spite of the hard economic sit uation in his country,
Redy invested all his money in music education, equipment and visiting
all kind of music happenings in order to get to know trance culture
as soon as possible.

The first invitation came in 2000 and since then he started to organize
parties, first in Bela Crkva and then all over his country and in 2004
he started to perform also in other countries.
